data.author: Moises Aranas

changelog.release_notes: Added Aplite (OG Pebble and Steel) support! Instead of colors to differentiate the current time zone and the custom time zone, the length of the hands differ - the shorter hour hand is the custom time zone.
Fixed hour hands to move with the minute hand gradually as well.

data.description: NaviTime GMT is an analog watchface that can tell time in 2 different timezones - your current timezone, and a custom offset you set in the settings. It's also easy to tell if it is night/day - the corresponding hour hand turns red at daytime, and blue at nighttime (6am to 6pm). A date indicator is also at the 3-o'clock mark. For OG Pebble and Pebble steel, the colored hands are replaced with hands of different lengths - the shorter hour hand represents the hour at the custom timezone you select.

latest_release.release_notes: Added Aplite (OG Pebble and Steel) support! Instead of colors to differentiate the current time zone and the custom time zone, the length of the hands differ - the shorter hour hand is the custom time zone.

data.title: NaviTime GMT
